reviewText: Picture & Sound Quality Perfect There's No Issues Good Job Eros,DONE.

The copy of this picture offered by Amazon is awful, they should be ashamed to offer this junk to their customers. Bad Transfer, Bad Acting, Very Bad Directing, in all...I am very surprised Rex Harrison was conned [I am almost sure] in participating in this Hindu produced thing [if you can call this a movie]. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME WITH THIS PIECE OF GARBAGE.
